cancelBtn - Variable in class view.ControlBar
Button used to clear information entered in an AddPerson
carrotsPicked - Variable in class model.Hobbit
String containing the number of carrots the hobbit picked
clearContents(ActionEvent) - Method in class view.DirectoryApp
Clears the data entered into an AddPerson form by replacing the current form with a new form.
comboBox - Variable in class view.Toolbar
ComboBox containing a list of ways the directory can be filtered
completedContracts - Variable in class model.ContractWorker
String containing the number of contacts the person completed
contractBtn - Variable in class view.Toolbar
Togglebutton used to bring up the form needed to add a new ContractWorker
ContractWorker - Class in model
Contract worker extends Smarty.

Public constructor for ContractWorker.
control - package control
 
ControlBar - Class in view
HBox that contains a save and cancel button used to add a new person to the directory
ControlBar() - Constructor for class view.ControlBar
Public constructor that initializes the save and cancel buttons and sets the spacing and alignment of the Hbox.
controlBar - Variable in class view.DirectoryApp
ControlBar used to save a new employee or clear the information from the textFields
createNewContractWorker(String, String, String, String, String, String) - Method in class control.PersonList
Adds a new ContractWorker to the arrayList using ContractWorker's public constructor

Adds a new HourlyWorker to the arrayList using HourlyWorker's public constructor
createPerson(ActionEvent) - Method in class view.DirectoryApp
Grabs the information the user typed in the AddPerson form and uses it to create a new employee and add them to the directory.
